tech_news.title: Nintendo Shares Plunge 10% After Weak Profit Spurs Margin Fears - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Nintendo Co.’s shares slid their most in 18 months after the company reported disappointing earnings, revealing a big hit to margins while concerns grow about the impact of soaring memory chip prices in 2026.

tech_news.title: Rumor: Voice actor page leaks Xenoblade game for 2026 - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: A new voice actor leak has allegedly outed a Xenoblade game for 2026, and it could be the return of Xenoblade Chronicles 2.

tech_news.title: TikToker Complains Air India Lounge Smells Like Indian Food, Gets Roasted - One Mile at a Time
tech_news.description: The internet has a lot of opinions after a TikToker complained that the Air India Lounge in New York smells like... Indian food.

tech_news.title: Nintendo Expands Switch Online's Game Boy Library With Two More Titles - Nintendo Life
AMD hints Microsoft could launch its next-gen Xbox in 2027 - The Verge
tech_news.description: AMD says it’s ready to support Microsoft launching its next-gen Xbox in 2027. The pair have partnered to work on a custom chip for the next Xbox.

tech_news.title: Windows 11 builds 26300.7733 (Dev) and 26220.7752 (Beta) arrive with built-in Sysmon - Neowin
Ashes of Creation's Former Comms Director Releases Statement, Giving Brief Timeline Of Intrepid's Shut Down - MMORPG.com
tech_news.description: Ashes of Creation's former Director of Communications has released a public statement today giving a glimpse into the timeline of the turmoil surrounding Intrepid Studios' sudden shutdown.

tech_news.title: Take-Two CEO Responds to Stock Price Drop Following Google Genie Announcement: 'I Think People Are Confusing Tools With Hits' - IGN
tech_news.description: Last week, Google announced Project Genie, an AI-powered virtual world creator still in its infancy that seemed to spook a number of video game investors. But at least one video game CEO isn't ruffled: Take-Two's Strauss Zelnick.

tech_news.title: The four best Super Bowl TV deals we found - The Verge
tech_news.description: There are countless TV deals at any given moment, but if you’re serious about quality, these 4K TV deals stand out from the rest for the Super Bowl.

tech_news.title: GTA 6 Still On Track For November Release, Marketing Campaign Kicks Off This Summer - GameSpot
tech_news.description: Rockstar's highly anticipated open-world action game remains on schedule.
